mapper.update: update dq_product set dq_name = #{dqName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dq_rates = #{dqRates,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, active_rates = #{activeRates,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, dq_days = #{dqDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, per_min_amt = #{perMinAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, per_max_amt = #{perMaxAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, invest_status = #{investStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where dq_product_id = #{dqProductId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select dq_product_id, dq_name, remark, dq_rates, active_rates, dq_days, per_min_amt, per_max_amt, invest_status, update_time from dq_product where dq_product_id = #{dqProductId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select dq_product_id, dq_name, remark, dq_rates, active_rates, dq_days, per_min_amt, per_max_amt, invest_status, update_time from dq_product
